One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Button" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that defines the settings for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> objects.

A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that defines the style settings for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> objects on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 참조는 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 에 대 한 스타일 설정을 정의 하는 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> 에 있는 개체는 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that defines the appearance for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> objects on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> 속성에 대 한 참조를 가져옵니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 개체에 대 한 모양을 정의 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> 에 있는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> 속성은 읽기 전용; 그러나의 속성을 설정할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 반환 되는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 양식에서 선언적으로 이러한 속성을 설정할 수 있습니다 `Property-Subproperty`여기서 `Subproperty` 의 속성을 나타내는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 클래스 (예를 들어 `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 양식에서 속성을 프로그래밍 방식으로 설정할 수 있습니다 `Property.Subproperty` (예를 들어 `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 일반 설정 사용자 지정 배경색, 텍스트 색 및 글꼴 속성을 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 스타일 설정을 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> 속성에 대 한 스타일 설정을 병합 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 적용 된 모든 설정은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> 속성에 해당 하는 설정을 재정의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> properties can be set to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control:
trans-unit.target: 다음 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> 속성 재정의를 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> 제어:

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep> template to define the appearance for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep> 서식 파일에 대 한 모양을 정의 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepStyle%2A> 속성이 적용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value that corresponds to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 값에 해당 하는 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.TagKey%2A> property is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.TagKey%2A> 확장할 속성은 주로 컨트롤 개발자가 사용 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Tracks view state.
Gets the ID of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> placeholder in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
The placeholder ID must be set to "WizardStepPlaceHolder".
trans-unit.target: 자리 표시자 ID "WizardStepPlaceHolder"로 설정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection containing all the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> objects that are defined for the control.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection" /> representing all the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> objects defined for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection" /> 모든 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase" /> 에 정의 된 개체는 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property returns a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that make up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> 속성의 컬렉션을 반환 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> 구성 하는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> collection to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> 액세스할 컬렉션은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> 에 포함 된 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> 프로그래밍 방식으로 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> methods to manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects in the collection programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> 조작 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> 프로그래밍 방식으로 컬렉션에 있는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> is persisted in Source view.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Visual Studio 2005를 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> 소스 뷰에서 유지 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> might be pointing to a different step.
trans-unit.target: 변경 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> 세로 막대 단추를 클릭 하 여 디자인 뷰에서 속성에는 다음의 첫 번째 단계는 페이지 실행는 `Wizard` 때문에 컨트롤을 표시할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> 다른 단계를 가리킬 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control contains multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collections, the collections will be merged.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> 컨트롤에는 여러 개 포함 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> 컬렉션, 컬렉션 병합 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 테마 또는 스타일 시트 테마가이 속성을 설정할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> 및 [ASP.NET 테마와 스킨](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control programmatically and how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> method to add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제를 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> 프로그래밍 방식으로 제어 하 고 사용 하는 방법을 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A> 메서드를 추가 하려면 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> 개체를 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> 컬렉션입니다.
